```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| title: Highway vs. city mileage
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = cty, y = hwy)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
n_cars <- nrow(mpg)

cat("title=", "Drive types of", n_cars, "cars")

ggplot(mpg, aes(x = drv)) +
  geom_bar()
```
